title: Welcome
content: "Today, we'll learn how to interpret a fraction as division (4.NF.3b)."

title: Teacher Avatar
content: "Hi! I'm your guide today. Did you know that 3 ÷ 4 is the same as 3/4? Let's see why!"

title: Visual Example
content: "Imagine 3 pizzas shared among 4 kids. Each gets 3/4 of a pizza."

title: Try It
content: "How would you write 5 divided by 2 as a fraction?"

title: Great Work
content: "You’ve just learned how fractions and division are connected!"
